20110116140119.500|20110116140122.000|TR0|which killed the Polish
20110116140122.000|20110116140124.500|TR0|President Lech Kaczynski, has
20110116140124.500|20110116140127.000|TR0|caused some controversy this
20110116140127.000|20110116140129.500|TR0|week.
20110116140129.500|20110116140132.000|TR0|

20110116140227.000|20110116140229.500|TR0|traffic controllers to land at

20110116140232.000|20110116140234.500|TR0|inexperienced flying in bad

20110116140243.667|20110116140247.000|TR0|behind the tragedy in their

20110116140249.500|20110116140252.000|TR0|

20110116140254.500|20110116140257.000|TR0|passenger pressure on the Crew

20110116140259.500|20110116140302.000|TR0|played a vital role in the
20110116140302.000|20110116140304.500|TR0|incident. Heres evidence the
20110116140304.500|20110116140307.000|TR0|crew was afraid of disappointing

20110116140309.500|20110116140312.000|TR0|.................................

20110116140559.500|20110116140602.000|TR0|

20110116140604.500|20110116140607.000|TR0|in the shape of the report,

20110116140642.000|20110116140644.500|TR0|Tadeusz Iwinski, Polish Foreign
20110116140644.500|20110116140647.000|TR0|Affairs CTTE
20110116140647.000|20110116140649.500|TR0|
20110116140649.500|20110116140652.000|TR0|While some have only got
20110116140652.000|20110116140654.500|TR0|political leverage in their
20110116140654.500|20110116140657.000|TR0|sights, others say the cause of
20110116140657.000|20110116140659.500|TR0|the disaster is clear-cut.
20110116140659.500|20110116140702.000|TR0|Michal Fiszer, former Polish Air
20110116140702.000|20110116140704.500|TR0|Force pilot Both Poland and
20110116140704.500|20110116140707.000|TR0|Russia have insisted on keeping

20110116140747.000|20110116140749.500|TR0|
20110116140749.500|20110116140752.000|TR0|BP has dubbed as historic its
20110116140752.000|20110116140754.500|TR0|multi-billion dollar joint
20110116140754.500|20110116140757.000|TR0|venture with Russia's oil firm
20110116140757.000|20110116140759.500|TR0|Rosneft.
20110116140759.500|20110116140802.000|TR0|
20110116140802.000|20110116140804.500|TR0|The companies will now join
20110116140804.500|20110116140807.000|TR0|forces to exploit potentially
20110116140807.000|20110116140809.500|TR0|huge deposits of oil and gas
20110116140809.500|20110116140812.000|TR0|buried under Russia's Arctic
20110116140812.000|20110116140814.500|TR0|continental shelf.
20110116140814.500|20110116140817.000|TR0|
20110116140817.000|20110116140820.333|TR0|Laura Emmett reports from
20110116140820.333|20110116140823.667|TR0|London, where the deal was
20110116140823.667|20110116140827.000|TR0|signed.
20110116140827.000|20110116140829.500|TR0|
20110116140829.500|20110116140832.000|TR0|[[PKG]]
20110116140832.000|20110116140834.500|TR0|
20110116140834.500|20110116140837.000|TR0|Its a deal that both parties
20110116140837.000|20110116140839.500|TR0|are calling a groundbreaking
20110116140839.500|20110116140842.000|TR0|strategic global alliance.
20110116140842.000|20110116140844.500|TR0|Russias biggest oil company
20110116140844.500|20110116140847.000|TR0|Rosneft has signed a share swap
20110116140847.000|20110116140849.500|TR0|deal with BP - its the first
20110116140849.500|20110116140852.000|TR0|major equity linked partnership
20110116140852.000|20110116140854.500|TR0|between a national and
20110116140854.500|20110116140857.000|TR0|international oil company. When
20110116140857.000|20110116140859.500|TR0|its done, Rosneft will own 5%
20110116140859.500|20110116140902.000|TR0|of BP, in exchange for a 9.5%
20110116140902.000|20110116140904.500|TR0|share in the Russian oil major.
20110116140904.500|20110116140907.000|TR0|Rosnefts chairman, deputy prime
20110116140907.000|20110116140909.500|TR0|minister Igor Sechin told RT
20110116140909.500|20110116140912.000|TR0|it's the beginning of a new
20110116140912.000|20110116140914.500|TR0|direction for the company....
20110116140914.500|20110116140917.000|TR0|Rosneft is working on a new
20110116140917.000|20110116140919.500|TR0|strategy, aimed at transforming
20110116140919.500|20110116140922.000|TR0|the company into an
20110116140922.000|20110116140924.500|TR0|international energy holding.
20110116140924.500|20110116140927.000|TR0|Our deal with BP is, of course,
20110116140927.000|20110116140929.500|TR0|part of this strategy. They've
20110116140929.500|20110116140932.000|TR0|gained a great deal of
20110116140932.000|20110116140934.500|TR0|experience, including the Gulf
20110116140934.500|20110116140937.000|TR0|of Mexico oil spill clean-up
20110116140937.000|20110116140939.500|TR0|operation. BP has learned from
20110116140939.500|20110116140942.000|TR0|this experience, and our joint
20110116140942.000|20110116140944.500|TR0|venture will be carried out with
20110116140944.500|20110116140947.000|TR0|the greatest level of measures
20110116140947.000|20110116140949.500|TR0|aimed at protecting the
20110116140949.500|20110116140952.000|TR0|environment. We've been working
20110116140952.000|20110116140954.500|TR0|with BP for many years, they're
20110116140954.500|20110116140957.000|TR0|competent and have strong
20110116140957.000|20110116140959.500|TR0|experience of Russian companies.
20110116140959.500|20110116141002.000|TR0|The aim is that Rosneft and BP
20110116141002.000|20110116141004.500|TR0|will team up to develop 3 areas
20110116141004.500|20110116141007.000|TR0|on the Russian Arctic shelf.
20110116141007.000|20110116141009.500|TR0|
20110116141009.500|20110116141012.000|TR0|Theres potentially a lot of oil
20110116141012.000|20110116141014.500|TR0|and gas down there, which
20110116141014.500|20110116141017.000|TR0|Rosneft owns the license to
20110116141017.000|20110116141019.500|TR0|exploit. Its a huge area -
20110116141019.500|20110116141022.000|TR0|around 125 thousand square
20110116141022.000|20110116141024.500|TR0|kilometres - and it wont be
20110116141024.500|20110116141027.000|TR0|easy to extract the resources.
20110116141027.000|20110116141029.500|TR0|The Arctic is a highly
20110116141029.500|20110116141032.000|TR0|inhospitable environment, and
20110116141032.000|20110116141034.500|TR0|requires sophisticated
20110116141034.500|20110116141037.000|TR0|technology and billions of
20110116141037.000|20110116141039.500|TR0|dollars of investment. But aside
20110116141039.500|20110116141042.000|TR0|from the cash, BP CEO Bob Dudley
20110116141042.000|20110116141044.500|TR0|says they've also got the life
20110116141044.500|20110116141047.000|TR0|experience.... BP's been working
20110116141047.000|20110116141049.500|TR0|with Rosneft for 12 years now,
20110116141049.500|20110116141052.000|TR0|and we've been working on the
20110116141052.000|20110116141054.500|TR0|Arctic floor since 2005 with
20110116141054.500|20110116141057.000|TR0|Rosneft, working with Sakhalin.
20110116141057.000|20110116141059.500|TR0|They know our capabilities, our
20110116141059.500|20110116141102.000|TR0|exploration capabilities. To be
20110116141102.000|20110116141104.500|TR0|honest, we've learned a lot
20110116141104.500|20110116141107.000|TR0|about what happened in the Gulf
20110116141107.000|20110116141109.500|TR0|of Mexico, it's shaken the
20110116141109.500|20110116141112.000|TR0|company to the core. We're going
20110116141112.000|20110116141114.500|TR0|to have renewed focus on safety,
20110116141114.500|20110116141117.000|TR0|risk management, and the
20110116141117.000|20110116141120.333|TR0|technology that's needed for the
20110116141120.333|20110116141123.667|TR0|environmental care of what we do
20110116141123.667|20110116141127.000|TR0|The Russian governments behind
20110116141127.000|20110116141129.500|TR0|the deal, and Prime Minister
20110116141129.500|20110116141132.000|TR0|Putin says all parties are ready
20110116141132.000|20110116141134.500|TR0|for the challenge.
20110116141134.500|20110116141137.000|TR0|
20110116141137.000|20110116141139.500|TR0|I would like to let you know
20110116141139.500|20110116141142.000|TR0|that the Russian government
20110116141142.000|20110116141144.500|TR0|supports this joint operation.
20110116141144.500|20110116141147.000|TR0|This is a project that could
20110116141147.000|20110116141149.500|TR0|become global, and have a
20110116141149.500|20110116141152.000|TR0|significant influence on the
20110116141152.000|20110116141154.500|TR0|world's oil and gas industry.
20110116141154.500|20110116141157.000|TR0|Russia's Arctic reserves are
20110116141157.000|20110116141159.500|TR0|estimated to be five Billion
20110116141159.500|20110116141202.000|TR0|tonnes of oil, and ten Trillion
20110116141202.000|20110116141204.500|TR0|cubic meters of gas. Such a
20110116141204.500|20110116141207.000|TR0|project may require tens of
20110116141207.000|20110116141209.500|TR0|Billions of dollars of
20110116141209.500|20110116141212.000|TR0|investment, and state-of-the-art
20110116141212.000|20110116141214.500|TR0|technology. We are fully aware
20110116141214.500|20110116141217.000|TR0|of the risks involved.]] The
20110116141217.000|20110116141219.500|TR0|artic is a highly contentious
20110116141219.500|20110116141222.000|TR0|area with many parties wanting a
20110116141222.000|20110116141224.500|TR0|slice of the potentially

20110116141232.000|20110116141234.500|TR0|
20110116141234.500|20110116141237.000|TR0|The exploration area that
